WorkItem.Description:
__HtmlEntity.DeEntitize__ method doesn't process unterminated numeric entities.

* Fails to decode Long UTF-8 Unicode encoding without semicolons.
* Fails to decode Hex encoding without semicolons.

Attached is patched version 1.4.6 code demonstrating defects and proposed solution.  Code uses __Debug.Assert__ to display failed test cases.  Just hit the ignore button to continue with tests.
WorkItem.Summary: HtmlEntity.DeEntitize method doesn't process unterminated numeric entities
